alert.note: Alert for Western Kent (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 12:04PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Plymouth, southeastern Bristol, Washington, Newport, southeastern Kent and south central Bristol Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1203 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near South Kingstown, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding and wind gusts to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... New Bedford, Fall River, Warwick, Dartmouth, South Kingstown, North Kingstown, Newport, Bristol, Marion, Westerly, Wareham, Portsmouth, Middletown, Fairhaven, Narragansett, Tiverton, Westport, East Greenwich, Acushnet and Hopkinton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
